mapper.select: select t2.*,t3.name as merchant_name from sp_favorite t1 right join sp_goods t2 on t1.subject_id = t2.goods_id and t1.subject_type = 1 and t1.status = 1 right join sp_merchant t3 on t2.merchant_id = t3.merchant_id where t1.user_id=#{loginUserId} order by t1.create_time desc
select t2.* from sp_favorite t1 right join sp_merchant t2 on t1.subject_id = t2.merchant_id and t1.subject_type = 2 and t1.status = 1 where t1.user_id=#{loginUserId} order by t1.create_time desc
